author: ivan
msg: Allocate serf_ssl_context_t in bucket pool instead of global pool to fix
issues when apr_terminate() is called without clearing connection pool.
See thread "Serf / SSL coredumps during apr_terminate" in serf-dev:
allocator instead of creating global pool.
(ssl_free_context): Remove code to destroy global pool.

author: ivan
msg: Increase IOV_MAX to 50 on Windows: there is no limit for iovec count on
Windows, but apr_socket_sendv allocates internal WSABUF structures on stack

author: ivan
msg: (socket_reader): Do not invoke progress callback if no data received

author: lgo
msg: Enable serf_get to take extra request headers.
(setup_request): Add extra headers to the request.

author: lgo
msg: Merge changes to fix compiler warnings:
r2089: no_more_writes doesn't need a REQUEST parameter.
